main.blocks:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <variables>
    <variable type="" id="WW(/_mafM}$OVVdvL11p">FireV</variable>
    <variable type="" id="L%{$62{b(n8lH@t/+p*3">item</variable>
    <variable type="" id="snIL~IxjDH4U:OrV5qKF">Gas</variable>
  </variables>
  <block type="pxt-on-start" x="1" y="0">
    <statement name="HANDLER">
      <block type="ir_init">
        <field name="pin">Pins.P8</field>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
  <block type="device_forever" x="1" y="97"></block>
  <block type="ir_received_left_event" x="-1" y="211">
    <field name="btn">RemoteButton.CH_MINUS</field>
    <statement name="HANDLER">
      <block type="device_set_digital_pin">
        <field name="name">DigitalPin.P0</field>
        <value name="value">
          <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
            <mutation min="0" max="1" label="Number"></mutation>
            <field name="SLIDER">1</field>
          </shadow>
        </value>
        <next>
          <block type="device_set_digital_pin">
            <field name="name">DigitalPin.P1</field>
            <value name="value">
              <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
                <mutation min="0" max="1" label="Number"></mutation>
                <field name="SLIDER">0</field>
              </shadow>
            </value>
            <next>
              <block type="device_set_digital_pin">
                <field name="name">DigitalPin.P2</field>
                <value name="value">
                  <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
                    <mutation min="0" max="1" label="Number"></mutation>
                    <field name="SLIDER">0</field>
                  </shadow>
                </value>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
  <block type="ir_received_left_event" x="0" y="445">
    <field name="btn">RemoteButton.CH</field>
    <statement name="HANDLER">
      <block type="device_set_digital_pin">
        <field name="name">DigitalPin.P0</field>
        <value name="value">
          <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
            <mutation min="0" max="1" label="Number"></mutation>
            <field name="SLIDER">0</field>
          </shadow>
        </value>
        <next>
          <block type="device_set_digital_pin">
            <field name="name">DigitalPin.P1</field>
            <value name="value">
              <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
                <mutation min="0" max="1" label="Number"></mutation>
                <field name="SLIDER">1</field>
              </shadow>
            </value>
            <next>
              <block type="device_set_digital_pin">
                <field name="name">DigitalPin.P2</field>
                <value name="value">
                  <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
                    <mutation min="0" max="1" label="Number"></mutation>
                    <field name="SLIDER">0</field>
                  </shadow>
                </value>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
  <block type="ir_received_left_event" x="1" y="683">
    <field name="btn">RemoteButton.CH_Add</field>
    <statement name="HANDLER">
      <block type="device_set_digital_pin">
        <field name="name">DigitalPin.P0</field>
        <value name="value">
          <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
            <mutation min="0" max="1" label="Number"></mutation>
            <field name="SLIDER">0</field>
          </shadow>
        </value>
        <next>
          <block type="device_set_digital_pin">
            <field name="name">DigitalPin.P1</field>
            <value name="value">
              <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
                <mutation min="0" max="1" label="Number"></mutation>
                <field name="SLIDER">0</field>
              </shadow>
            </value>
            <next>
              <block type="device_set_digital_pin">
                <field name="name">DigitalPin.P2</field>
                <value name="value">
                  <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
                    <mutation min="0" max="1" label="Number"></mutation>
                    <field name="SLIDER">1</field>
                  </shadow>
                </value>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>
